'''Radiant Spincrystal 53''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Hanachirusato (Soundtrack)|Hanachirusato]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on the roof of a building in the [[Kamisato Estate]].
